page.title: 08The Pottery, Prickwillow
page.content: The Pottery can be found next to the only Village Shop, by the Bridge. When the Children asked{Mr Andrews about Prickwillow Pottery, this was his reply. 'We started this Pottery about 10 years ago, it used to be Coal Sheds and Garages. There aren't many people at Prickwillow so it is friendly and the Community like the Pottery. I enjoy Pottery because I can see how much I have done. Each Pot is slightly different, it has a life of its own. We don't use local Clay as it does not fire well. We use Staffordshire and{Devon Clay.}We mix them depending on the job. I use about 12 hundredweights a week. If I have a special order it takes 2 or 3 weeks to make'. While we were there we saw pots, vases, plaques, bird whistles, money boxes and pieces to make up dolls.
